trends: There have been no other sightings in Dimmitt
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: five family members witnessed a boomerang object in western sky
divs: Sighting DetailsWe had a family gathering for laber day weekend in Dimmitt, Texas. late in the evening, about 15 of us agreed to go outside and watch for falling stars. The night sky was clear and a perfect nigth for star gazing and looking for falling stars. My daughter and I saw a faint cloud moving from the north. I watched this cloud and noticed that it appeared more like a boomerang shape. I got up from my chair and pointed to the object. my daughter, who was sitting next to me, also got up and saw the object. my wife, two brothers,,a newphew and neice also saw the the object. The object made a right turn toward the West, which is the direction of New Mexico, and then we lost tract of it. We were all astonish. We all described the same shape like object. My wife and one brother said the object had white lights around the object. The lights were symmetrical. The object did not make any noise and appeared to be the flying at a level as small private single engine plane. The object did not leave any kind of vapor trail.
